formula_utils.py¶

Auxiliary formula functions implementation

Parameters:
  • parsetree_list – List BINARY formula parsetree list
  • connective – String main operator of bynary formula
Returns:

String string representation of the new binary formula with de morgan rule applied

  • connective – String main operator of bynary formula
Returns:

srcLRparsing.formula_utils.get_NNF_recursive(parsetree_list)[source]¶

Get negation normal form from a parsetree list WITH NO IMPLICATIONS :param parsetree_list: List tree representation of the string formula with no implications :return: List parsetree list in negation normal form

srcLRparsing.formula_utils.get_len(parsetree_list)[source]¶

Return the size of a formula without counting brackets, only symbols :param parsetree_list: List parsetree list :return: Int size of the formula

tableau.py¶

PC-Tableaux implementation

srcLRparsing.tableau.apply_alpha_rules(tableaux_dict, belief)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • tableaux_dict – Dict tableaux dict structure with a list of tableau and some global attributes
  • belief – Boolean if it is to use logic of belief
Returns:

Dict of tableaux with all alpha rules applied to its branches in tableaux_dict[‘tableaux’]

Parameters:tableaux_dict – Dict tableaux dict structure with a list of tableau and some global attributes
Returns:Dict of tableaux with all its branches as subformula complete
srcLRparsing.tableau.get_tableaux(formula_list, belief)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • formula_list – List list of parsetree_list representing all initial formulas in NNF
  • belief – Boolean if it is to use logic of belief
Returns:

List of tableaux with all rules applied to its branches
srcLRparsing.tableau.is_proper(tableau)[source]¶

Loop through formulae in reverse mode. Based on tableau construction, small formulae should be at the end of it :param tableau: Dict tableau dict structure with a list of formulae and some attributes :return: Boolean True if is proper, False otherwise

graph.py¶

Tableau structure implementation

Parameters:tableaux_list – List list of tableau dicts structure with a list of formulae
Returns:List a list of states labelled by their index with all formulae as a list of parsetree list

Parameters:G – NetworkX graph
Returns:None
srcLRparsing.graph.get_graph(tableaux_list, idx, belief)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • tableaux_list – List list of tableau dict structure with a list of tableau and some global attributes
  • idx – Int index of the graph
  • belief – Boolean if it is to use logic of belief
Returns:

Dict containing the states list, next time relation list and knowledge relation list
